mdui:UIInfo.mdui:Description: University of Oxford Text Archive

md:AttributeConsumingService.md:ServiceDescription: The University of Oxford Text Archive develops, collects, catalogues, preserves and makes available to others electronic literary and linguistic resources for use in Higher Education, in research, teaching and learning. The Oxford Text Archive is part of the CLARIN European Research Infrastructure, developing shared services with repositories across Europe and beyond.
